name: read wavefront obj
desc: The read_obj module reads Wavefront OBJ files for display.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Image Quality
properties.desc: The Image Quality allows the user to select the maximum resolution to read the input image in at.  This allows the user to create a coarse image for faster testing and a high resolution image for the final output.

properties.name: Read Alpha Channel
properties.desc: This toggle will prevent the module from reading the image alpha channel into memory when turned to the Off position.

properties.name: Sharpen Image
properties.desc: The Soften Image toggle makes the image smoother by applying low intensity pixel averaging.

properties.name: Soften Image
properties.desc: The Sharpen Image toggle increases the visibility of details on the image.

properties.name: Edge Enhance
properties.desc: The Edge Enhance toggle enhances the edges of the objects and discards other image information.

properties.name: Brightness
properties.desc: The Brightness of the image can be adjusted when the Adjust Brightness toggle is selected

properties.name: Contrast
properties.desc: The Contrast of the image can be be adjusted when the Adjust Contrast toggle is selected.

properties.name: Transform List
properties.desc: The list of transformation applied to the input field.

properties.name: Export
properties.desc: The Filename for the output EVS Textured Field File (*.eft).

properties.name: Convert To Packaged
properties.desc: Replace this module with a packaged version of the data.
